channel.description: Articles about everything related to smart home. Here we explore what are the various ways we can integrated smart devices to Home Assistant and much more.

item.title: How I Added a Matter Device to Home Assistant - Step By Step Guide
item.description: In this article, we will be looking at how we can connect Matter-enabled devices to Home Assistant
